content: Fix TestWebSocketResponse URL from ws:// to wss:// since echo.websocket.org redirects HTTP to HTTPS
Examine WebSocket dialer configuration to ensure proper HTTP/1.1 protocol version is forced for WebSocket handshake
Add proper WebSocket headers and User-Agent to match working TestWebSocketClient pattern
Research and implement gospider007/requests WebSocket patterns for better compatibility
Test the fixed implementation against echo.websocket.org and local server
